user_story: As a user of an e-commerce website, I want to be able to log in to my account so that I can access my order history and saved preferences.
acceptance_criteria: A user with valid credentials (email and password) should be able to log in successfully
A user with invalid credentials should see an error message and remain on the login page
The login form must have fields for 'Email' and 'Password', and a 'Login' button
The password field should mask the characters as they are typed
